content: Not entirely sure what I'm supposed to do about this error message after running a database upgrade. Screen-Shot-2020-06-13-at-6.54.36-PM.png

Hey @Jeff Porten can you please open an issue about this in https://github.com/backdrop/backdrop-issues/issues ? ...please copy-paste the full error (it's chopped in the screenshot), and also provide a list of which updates are still pending.

backdrop/backdrop-issues
Issue tracker for Backdrop core. Contribute to backdrop/backdrop-issues development by creating an account on GitHub.

I don't think we have enough info to help much. Would need to see the error logs. Could be that it's unrelated to the updates; could be on every page but just seeing the error printed to the screen here
Drat, apologies, I didn't notice the cutoff in the screenshot, and I can't replicate the error now. If I see it again next time I upgrade I'll take better notes.
No worries @Jeff Porten ...seems that the problem is fixed for you now (assuming that no pending db updates are shown on the site).
I haven't seen any further errors, but I also haven't had much time to work with it. Trust me, I'll come back here if I see anything scary.
